(A) Evidence of Erosion: There has been some erosion observed in the headwaters of the north and east forks, plus major erosion in the west fork.
(C) Water levels: Very low water levels up to spawning period; high water levels during spawning period.
(H) recommended enhancement: A detailed survey is required to determine species presence and useage in this system in order to ensure habitat protection.
(K) Additional comments: Chinook, chum, and coho have been recorded historically but data is minimal - more effort needs to be put into this system. the
